articles.title: Tough sanctions start Monday in Iran
articles.description: In Iran, a new round of tough sanctions begin Monday. The Trump administration put them into place after the president withdrew from the Iran nuclear deal in May. On "Face the Nation," Secretary of State Mike Pompeo defended the sanctions. CBS News foreign co…

articles.title: Catfishing leads victims to lose billions of dollars
articles.description: Catfishing is a scam targeting people who look for love online. Victims in the U.S. and Canada say they lost nearly a billion dollars over the last three years. CBS News correspondent Meg Oliver tracked down victims on both sides who have fallen prey.

articles.title: New details released about Florida yoga studio shooter
articles.description: New details about the gunman who opened fired in a Florida yoga studio killing two people have been released. Scott Paul Beierle was known to Tallahassee police and had a history of violence toward young women. CBS News correspondent Manuel Bojorquez reports.

articles.title: Democrats look to take control of House
articles.description: Democrats hope to regain control of the House from Republicans by flipping 24 seats -- more than half of them are in the Midwest. CBS News correspondent Dean Reynolds reports.
